channel.title: Changing item spawning to all players on a 562
channel.description:
Hey I want to change my server to a freespawn server and i was wondering how to change it so all players can spawn whatever they want. If it is not too hard for you too explain i also want to make it so a few items can be restricted. I am new to 562s but i know how to do it on a 317.
Thanks, ddrman (aka kool j rod, owner of yamiscape 317 and 562 :))

item.title: Changing item spawning to all players on a 562
item.dc:creator: @ddrman ddrman
item.description:
@ddrman wrote:

I know that part of it, what files do I go into?

Read full topic
item.source: Changing item spawning to all players on a 562

item.title: Changing item spawning to all players on a 562
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

If it says p.rights >= 1 change it to 0 or p.rights += 1 change to right 0

Read full topic
